actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize establishment of the William Jennings Bryan Birthplace National Historic Site, Salem, Illinois, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes establishment of the William Jennings Bryan Birthplace National Historic Site in Salem, Illinois, to be administered by the Secretary of the Interior.

titles.title: A bill to authorize establishment of the William Jennings Bryan Birthplace National Historic Site, Salem, Illinois, and for other purposes.
